entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 04:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -38.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
